structure.unit: STOCK INSURANCE COMPANIES -- OTHER THAN LIFE (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 762a-22.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Liability for partial or total loss on valued policy of fire or storm insurance; coinsurance clause exceptions.
